Name: capacity_per_team_not_exceeded
Description: Sum of task efforts assigned to a sprint must not exceed team capacity

Name: story_points_within_sprint_velocity
Description: Sum of story points per sprint must not exceed sprint velocity

Name: daily_scrum_duration_cap
Description: Daily Scrum duration must be â‰¤ 15 minutes

Name: sprint_duration_bounds
Description: Sprint duration between 1 and 30 days (end_date - start_date)

Name: worker_availability_respected
Description: Allocated work per worker must not exceed availability

Name: product_backlog_active_only
Description: Active Product Backlogs cannot have status 'archived'

Name: sprint_goal_defined_and_tracked
Description: Each sprint must have an associated goal and achievement status

Name: blockers_resolved_before_task_completion
Description: Tasks cannot complete while any linked blocker is open

Name: sprint_backlog_effort_consistency
Description: SprintBacklog total_effort equals sum of assigned task efforts

Name: scrum_board_cards_consistency
Description: ScrumBoard number_of_cards equals number of active tasks in sprint

Name: release_includes_ready_features_only
Description: Only features with status 'ready' can be planned in a release

Name: velocity_trend_nonnegative
Description: Velocity trend must be nonnegative for planned sprints

Name: minimum_review_attendance
Description: Sprint Review must meet a minimum attendees_count threshold
